1370: Erenboede moved to Nieu straet.A.4 after marriage.
Got married to Heile at age 31 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Heile, Sarre, at age 31.
1372: Had a daughter with Heile, Gheesen, at age 33.
1373: Had a son with Heile, Lennot, at age 34.
1375: Had a daughter with Heile, Nimme, at age 36.
1376: Lost son Lennot when Lennot was 4 years old.
1378: Had a son with Heile, Sylof, at age 39.
Lost son Sylof when Sylof was 1 years old.
1381: Lost his wife Heile while she was giving birth to Wasseliin in 1381.
1383: Lost daughter Nimme when Nimme was 9 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
